ns5:UMLClass.description: An instance of the Security Service Metadata.

ns5:SemanticMetadata.conceptDefinition: A software system providing a public need.
Security; freedom from anxiety or fear.
Data about data; information that describes another set of data.

ns2:Operation.description: The standard caGrid Data Service query method.
ns2:Operation.name: query

ns2:Fault.description: Thrown when an error occurs in processing a CQL query
ns2:Fault.name: QueryProcessingException

ns2:Fault.description: Thrown when a query is found to be improperly formed
ns2:Fault.name: MalformedQueryException

ns2:Operation.description: The standard caGrid Data Service query method.
ns2:Operation.name: executeQuery

ns2:Fault.description: Thrown when an error occurs in processing a CQL query
ns2:Fault.name: QueryProcessingException

ns2:Fault.description: Thrown when a query is found to be improperly formed
ns2:Fault.name: MalformedQueryException

ns2:Operation.description: The standard caGrid Data Service query method which returns results via the caGrid Transfer framework.
ns2:Operation.name: transferQuery

ns2:Fault.description: Thrown when an error occurs in processing a CQL query
ns2:Fault.name: QueryProcessingException

ns2:Fault.description: Thrown when a query is found to be improperly formed
ns2:Fault.name: MalformedQueryException

ns2:Operation.description: The standard caGrid Data Service query method which takes CQL 2 and returns results via the caGrid Transfer framework.
ns2:Operation.name: executeTransferQuery

ns2:Fault.description: Thrown when an error occurs in processing a CQL query
ns2:Fault.name: QueryProcessingException

ns2:Fault.description: Thrown when a query is found to be improperly formed
ns2:Fault.name: MalformedQueryException

ns2:ContextProperty.description: Describes the level of support for CQL versions
ns2:ContextProperty.name: {http://org.cagrid.dataservice.cql/QueryLanguageSupport}QueryLanguageSupport

ns14:SemanticMetadata.conceptDefinition: A service available on a system that coordinates resources that are not subject to central control, using open, general purpose protocols and interfaces to deliver nontrivial qualities of services.

ns15:SemanticMetadata.conceptDefinition: A web service which accepts as input a query targeted at a data resource addressable by the system and returns information to the client in the form of one or more data objects.
